spark.files.include: Glob patterns to include in the package. The default is php
spark.files.exclude: Glob patterns to exclude from the package. The default is vendor, and any hidden files
spark.files.watch: The list of directories to watch for changes
spark.files.showPath: Show the path of the file in the name of the list of generated files
spark.listFilesView.welcome:
To effectively capture files, ensure you include the plural form of the file type within the workspace settings.
[Open Workspace Setting](command:workbench.action.openWorkspaceSettingsFile)
To learn more about how to use CodeIgniter 4 Spark for VS Code [read our docs](https://github.com/ManuelGil/vscode-spark-generator).
spark.listRoutesView.welcome:
Sorry, no routes were found. Please ensure that you have a defined router configured.
[List Routes](command:spark.terminal.routes)
To learn more about how to use CodeIgniter 4 Spark for VS Code [read our docs](https://github.com/ManuelGil/vscode-spark-generator).
